## web package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [decodeUrlParameters(data)](./web.decodeurlparameters.md) | Decode the ExpositionValues from a given UrlParameters data set |
|  [encodeUrlParameters(exposition)](./web.encodeurlparameters.md) | Extract URL safe values from the current exposition state |
